## intervalToAbbreviatedDurationString() function

### intervalToAbbreviatedDurationString() function

intervalToAbbreviatedDurationString converts interval to readable duration string

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function intervalToAbbreviatedDurationString(interval: Interval, includeSeconds?: boolean): string;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { intervalToAbbreviatedDurationString } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  interval | <code>Interval</code> | interval to convert |
|  includeSeconds | <code>boolean</code> | optional, default true. If false, will not include seconds unless interval is less than 1 minute |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
